current.footercontenttext_design4:
Shipping AND Delivery

We're dedicated to delivering your purchase as quickly and affordably as possible. We offer a range of delivery and pickup options, so you can choose the shipping method that best meets your needs.

Payment Methods

Every country and shopper has their prefered method to pay online. Offering your buyers safe and convenient payment choices can help your sale go smoothly, earn you positive Feedback, and bring them back for more.

settings.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Donec eros tellus, scelerisque nec, rhoncus eget, laoreet sit amet.

settings.code:
WE STARTED AT THE KERNEL
The size & shape of our kernels allows us to infuse our blend of protein and all-natural flavors.

BRING ON THE PROTEIN
Protein Popcorn kernals are infused with premium Whey Protein Isolate and Milk Protein Isolate to deliver you 2x-5x times the protein of store brands.

IT’S NOT MAGIC... JUST SWEET SCIENCE:

Its a real trick to create a tasty-yet-sweet bite-sized snack that’s not loaded with cheap ingredients like sugar.

After experimenting with prototype after prototype, we finally created a tasty bite that's sure to kick any sweet cravings you have to the curb. Enjoy!

Gourmet Rice Crispy treats… Hacked!

Rather than using cheap filler ingredients like rice cereal or sugar, we’ve infused our Crispy Cakes with high quality whey protein isolate. This ensures our Crispy Cakes are not only mouth watering, but also PFC balanced.

settings.text2: Get a Variety Pack of all our snacks, the share it pack has 72 snacks!

settings.text_3_2:
GET A VARIETY OF ALL OUR SNACKS,
THIS PACK HAS 36 SNACKS

settings.top-bannertext:
SNACKS THAT WILL HELP
YOU STAY ON-TRACK!
DID WE MENTION THEY ARE
MACRO BALANCED & YUMMY!

settings.pfctitle:
WHAT DOES IT MEANS
TO BE PFC BALANCED?
settings.pfc-bannertext: Hacked Snacks contain a balance of protein, fat and carbohydrates (PFC’s). Eating a snack or meal with balanced PFCs every 3 hours has been proven to balance blood sugar, protect muscles and trigger the body to consistently release stored fat.

settings.tracktitle: Stay on track with a snack box
settings.track-bannertext: We understand what its like to be on the go and to try to eat healthy... it's hard! To reach our health goals we created a better way of snacking. Stay on track with your health goals by continuing to eat Balanced PFC (Protein, Fat & Carbs) Snacks. Don't go without!

settings.ss-bannertext:
Get the most PFC Balanced Snacks ever made to your door on a monthly subscription.

Don't worry, you can cancel Any time! Subscribe and get free shipping on all orders! Dont worry about junky snacks - get the healthy ones to your door.

settings.sub-bannertext:
SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER FOR A CHANCE TO WIN A
24 PACK OF VARIETY POPCORN

settings.subtextcart: Subscribe to our newsletter to win a protein popcorn variety pack (24 pack)

settings.subtextfooter: Subscribe to our newsletter to win a protein popcorn variety pack (24 pack)

settings.item_title: I EAT HACKED SNACKS A FEW TIMES A DAY & IM LOSING WEIGHT & STAYING ON-TRACK!
TASTES SO GOOD - THERE IS NO WAY THIS IS HEALTHY FOR YOU!

settings.item_text: We have many box options to choose from! Small to Large, rectangular to square, Protein Popcorn to Crispy Cakes, you are sure to find the perfect fit for you.
Choose the flavors you want. We have Protein Popcorn, Crispy Cakes, and Protein Bites.

settings.item_title: GET YOUR SNACKS WHEN YOU WANT THEM
settings.item_text: Order one time or get free shipping with a subscription. You can always cancel, move your subscription date earlier or skip a shipment.

settings.ab_description:
Austin is on the go a ton and loves to snack. He got fed up with the choices (or lack of good choices).

When he met Colby who had created private label snacks for years they found out they both had a passion for creating healthy snacks that tasted good. Shortly after that the PFC balanced snack revolution began.
